txt.en: Instance: The River Gate
'TBD - Blah!'
Assure Hármelak that <rgb=#00FF00>yes</rgb>, you have seen it
Convince Hármelak that the river gate must be closed
'TBD - Blah!'
Temámir archers hold you at bay. You can fight no longer
Talk to Jajax in Dâr Laja
'TBD - Blah!'
Talk to Khôltekh in Dâr Laja
Talk to Jajax in Dâr Laja
'TBD - Blah!'
'TBD - Blah!'
At a gesture from the Golden Queen, the guards encircle you
The haste of your errand permits no delay: the Kindred of the Coins must be warned of the approaching danger!
'TBD - Blah!'
Khôltekh has stepped through the line of Temámir archers to address you.
'TBD - Blah!'
Jajax has come with you to Dâr Laja to warn the Kindred of the Coins about the approaching danger.
Hármelak stands upon the dais in Dâr Laja.
You and Jajax have done what you could. Now it must be up to others.
Hármelak stares at you in disbelief, waiting for you to answer her question with a <rgb=#00FF00>yes</rgb>.
Only the Kindred of the Coins can command the river gate be closed. You and Jajax must convince Hármelak to issue the order.
You and Jajax stand alone against the guardsmen in Dâr Laja.
Follow Jajax to speak with the Kindred of the Coins in Dâr Laja
Talk to Jajax in Dâr Laja
Talk to Hármelak in Dâr Laja
You and Jajax have failed!
'You are certain of this? You have seen this fleet?'
'For what reason would Nakási harm Umbar Baharbêl?'
'The hatred she bears is for Gondor.'
'The river gate will remain open!'
'If the Song of Waves and Wind is to be the doom of Gondor, I will not stand in its way!'
'You must order the closing of the river gate!'
'Seize them.'
'Only the Kindred of the Coins can prevent this fleet from passing the city!'
'The Kindred will protect us. Hurry now!'
'But... it is in your power to prevent this.'
Fight alongside Jajax in Dâr Laja
'How is it you know the name of this fleet, Hármelak...'
'...when neither of us have spoken it aloud?'
'This Corsair fights for Umbar, not for the usurping Kindred!'
Talk to Hármelak in Dâr Laja
